attributes.additional_details:
Iconic and well known rapper Cashtastic has been a resident of the UK since he was 6 years old, not only a credible and well known Artist, he is also an INSPIRATION to so many people living in deprived areas of the UK.

He has been given two weeks before he is deported from the UK.

We believe that he is a positive male role model that not only the British people need, but the whole world and we will do everything we can to see that he stays!
